tasks.task: Gardening and soil preparation at a farm.
subtasks: Using a tiller to till the soil.
Distributing fertilizer evenly across the garden plot.
Watering the prepared soil using a sprinkler system.

tasks.task: Planting vegetable seeds in a field.
subtasks: Digging shallow furrows with a hoe.
Planting seeds at the correct spacing and depth.
Covering planted seeds with soil and tamping down lightly.

tasks.task: Harvesting crops using hands and a wheelbarrow.
subtasks: Selecting ripe vegetables from the field.
Grasping the base of the plant and lifting it into a wheelbarrow.
Transporting harvested crops to the storage area.
Organizing empty crates in the packing room.
Washing the harvested produce under a faucet.
Placing cleaned vegetables into crates, ensuring proper packing to prevent damage.

tasks.task: Driving a pickup truck to transport produce to market.
subtasks: Loading crates onto the pickup truck bed.
Securing crates with straps to prevent shifting during transport.
Navigating the truck through local roads to the farmers' market.

tasks.task: Interacting with customers at a farmers' market.
subtasks: Setting up a stall with signage and price labels.
Answering inquiries about the freshness and origin of the produce.
Packaging customer orders using brown paper bags or plastic containers.

tasks.task: Performing basic maintenance on a cabbage press.
subtasks: Adapting a wine press for use with cabbages.
Loading cabbages into the press chamber.
Adjusting the press weight to the appropriate level for juice extraction.
Collecting press juice into containers and transferring to storage.
Disassembling a plow for washing.
Scrubbing parts with a stiff brush and soapy water.
Lubricating moving parts with oil before reassembly.
Storing cleaned plow in a sheltered area to protect from weather.
Walking along irrigation pipes to inspect for blockages.
Removing clogged nozzles or filters using a pipe cleaner.
Ensuring all sprinkler heads are working and adjusting spray patterns as needed.

tasks.task: Conducting a soil test to assess fertility.
subtasks: Collecting soil samples from various parts of the garden.
Mixing samples in a designated container and sending to testing laboratory.
Noting pH, nutrient levels, and making notes for fertilizer recommendations.

tasks.task: Pruning tomato plants to encourage fruiting.
subtasks: Identifying lower leaves that are shading the lower stems.
Using pruning shears to remove overgrown branches.
Maintaining a plant height of about 2-3 feet to prevent excessive shade.
Selecting seedlings with 4-6 leaves.
Carefully removing roots from containers without damaging them.
Planting in larger pots with fresh potting soil and ensuring proper support.
